function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for the link between value and risk","Impact":"Failure to account for potential risks to the project's value and cost-effectiveness","Mitigation":"Integrate risk assessment into the value engineering process to identify and mitigate potential risks","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, value engineering software","People":"Project managers, engineers, value engineering team","Owner":"Project managers, value engineering team"},{"Description":"Overprovision of information and functionality leading to increased project cost","Impact":"Higher project cost due to unnecessary excess information and functionality","Mitigation":"Implement building information modeling (BIM) to prevent overprovision and optimize project costs","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM)","People":"Project managers, BIM specialists, value engineering team","Owner":"Project managers, BIM specialists"}]}
